subject: Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: N.B.A. Commissioner David Stern said the league was projecting the salary cap to be higher than it had expected, good news for teams looking to sign top stars during this summer’s expected free-agency bonanza.
snippet: N.B.A. Commissioner David Stern said the league was projecting the salary cap to be higher than it had expected, good news for teams looking to sign top stars during this summer’s expected free-agency bonanza.
